headline: FRIDAY NIGHT COCAINE BINGE 🥳💊💸 FUELS RUSSIAN WAR MACHINE TANK FACTORIES 🚀🇷🇺💥 – UK NCA DROPS THE BOMB 💣🕵️‍♂️!
text:
YO BRUVS 🕺🇬🇧, that FRIDAY NIGHT SNORT 💨🤧 at the pub ain't just PARTY TIME 🎉🍾 – it's straight-up BANKROLLING Putin's TANK ORGY 🚀💦 in Ukraine! 😱💥 UK NCA 🕵️‍♂️🔒 spilling the TEA ☕ on a VAST CRIMINAL ECOSYSTEM 🌍🕷️ washing DRUG CASH 💰🍃 thru RUSSIAN ARMS FACTORIES 🏭🔫 – from your NOSE CANDY 👃💊 to BOMBS OVER KYIV 💣🇺🇦!

SAL MELKI 💅🕵️‍♂️, NCA's ECON CRIME DADDY 👑📈, ROASTING: 'This BEAST 🐲 funds BAD SH*T 🌍😈 worldwide!' They BUSTED GEORGE ROSSI 🤡🏦, TGR boss, SNATCHING 75% of KEREMET BANK 🏦💸 in Kyrgyzstan on CHRISTMAS DAY 🎄🎁 2024 via ALTAIR HOLDING – sneaky AF! 😈 That BANK was PSB's SANCTIONS EVASION BITCH 🐶🚫, US Treasury calls it HUB O' HELL 🔥, piping PAYMENTS to RUSSIAN MILITARY-INDUSTRIAL BASE 🏭⚔️ for UKRAINE WAR WEAPONS 💥🎯!

OPERATION DESTABILISE 🕵️‍♂️🔥 started chasing EVIL CORP ransomware goblins 👻💻 but UNCOVERED EYE-WATERING BILLIONS 💦🤑 in DIRTY LAUNDRY! TGR + SMART networks 🤝🧼 (run by EKATERINA ZHDANOVA 👩‍🦰🔒 now CHILLING in French jail ⛓️🇫🇷) SWAP street COKE 💊💰, GUNZ 🔫, PEOPLE SMUGGLERS 🚢👥 for CRYPTO 🍌📈 in 28 UK CITIES 🏙️🇬🇧 – FULL SPECTRUM WASH SERVICE 🧼💸 like CRIMINALS' UBER EATS 🚀🍔!

STREET LEVEL? DRUG LORDS 🤑👑 drop CASH in STASH HOUSES 🏠💼 or SMUGGLE in WASHING POWDER 📦🧼 + BABY FORMULA 🍼 – genius PUN GAME STRONG! 😂 SMART hooked up with BULGARIAN SPY RING 🕵️‍♂️🇧🇬 led by ORLIN ROUSSEV 👀🕶️ tracking Putin's ENEMIES across Europe 🌍🔍. Links to IRISH KINAHAN CARTEL 🍀💊 via SEMEN KUKSOV 🌽😏 + ANDRII DZEKTSA, plus EX-HIBERNIAN BALLER JAMES KEATINGS ⚽️💰 laundering like pros!

TWO DUDES VALERIYPOPOVYCH + VITALIY LUTSAK 🚗🇺🇦 bought UK CARS 💨, DROVE to UKRAINE, FLIPPED for CRYPTO 📈 – £6.63M DIRTY POUNDS 🤑💸 Aug '22-Jun '23! BOTTOM RUNG COURIERS 🏃‍♂️💼 get 0.5% COMMISH ( £500 on £100K 🤑) but RISK 5+ YEARS SLAMMER ⛓️😱 – 'YOU OWN ALL THE RISK' warns MELKI 🔥!

NCA GOING HARD 🥊: ADS above URINALS 🚽💦 in MOTORWAY SERVICES 🛣️ in RUSSIAN + ENGLISH: 'MOVING MAFIA MONEY 💸🐔 seems EASY PEASY 🍆 but ENDS in HARD TIME ⛓️😩!' Walls CLOSING IN 🧱🚫 – 'We KNOW you, COMING FOR YA' 👻🕵️‍♂️! From FRIDAY COCAINE HIT 👃💊 to GEOPOLITICAL PAIN 🌍💥, this THREAD connects it ALL 🕸️ – DON'T BE A SIMP FOR CRIME, BRUVS! 🚫🤡 Support if ADDICTED via BBC LINE 📞❤️.
